name: Cave´s Quest
description:
This is a prototype, I´m new making games and I also wanted to do this long time ago, I will also appreciate that you give me some hints or tips in order to make this game better, and also I would like to say that the art concept of the game is not mine, special thanks to Ansimuz who helped me a lot thanks to his beautiful pixel art concept, go and give him a like if you have the time please.

By the way, for english speakers, you can view here the instructions:

A and D for moving your character,

 W for jump,

 S for crouch

 and J for attack
